alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 3:19AM CST until December 13 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN WICHITA COUNTY... At 319 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Iowa Park, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Wichita Falls, Iowa Park, Sheppard AFB, Pleasant Valley and Cashion. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
